etymology.description: 屌(屌) (diǎo, "male genitalia/slang for cocky/), 丝(絲) (sī, "silk/thread")
etymology.interpretation: 屌丝(屌絲) (diǎosī) is a slang term originating from Chinese internet culture, humorously referring to someone seen as a 'loser' or lacking in success by the traditional standards of wealth, prestige, or relationships. It juxtaposes the raw and blunt connotation of 屌(屌) (diǎo, "male genitalia/slang for cocky") with the soft, delicate imagery of 丝(絲) (sī, "silk/thread"), creating an ironic label for individuals who might not meet conventional success criteria but embrace their circumstances with humor and defiance.

examples.chinese: 他觉得自己是个屌丝(他覺得自己是個屌絲)。
examples.english: He thinks he is a loser.

examples.chinese: 他的朋友总嘲笑他(他的朋友總嘲笑他)，认为他是个屌丝(認為他是個屌絲)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de péngyǒu zǒng cháoxiào tā, rènwéi tā shìgè diǎosī.
examples.english: His friends always laugh at him, thinking he is a loser.
